No. 94547)} Sub: Revision in Dress Allowance W.e.f. 01.01.2024-reg: The Competent Authority has accorded the approval to increase the limit of Dress Allowance by 25% from Rs. 5000/- per annum to Rs. 6250/- per annum to the entitled NHAI Employees [Regular Staff Car Driver and Sr. MTS/MTS, who are supposed to wear Uniform Regularly], with effect from 01.01.2024 subject to other conditions mentioned in Department of Expenditure (DoE) OM No: 19051/1/2017-E.IV dated 02.08.2017 (copy enclosed) adopted by NHAI vide Circular No. 11041/9/2016-HR.| dated 06.12.2017. 2. The other instructions issued vide DoE's O.M. dated 02.08.2017 shall apply mutatis mutandis to these entitled Employees of NHAI: 3. The Concerned Officers/ Finance Division at NHAI HQ ROs PIUs/ CMUs are requested to take necessary action in this matter. 4. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl: As stated above (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ilc Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers & Employees of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3. Web Admin for circulation.
